column4: Guys, I have an issue when I try to click system then display I get this error.  http://dl.dropbox.com/u/2066611/ss.png
That means exactly what it says.
Are you using the proprietary nvidia driver?
nvidia's proprietary drivers (which cannot be modified by the Ubuntu developers) do not support the standard methods of display configuration. You want to click 'Yes' on that dialog.
There appears to be no VNC server running on the IP address from which you are connected.
